Juniors & Parties

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balaclava and Gloves for hygiene reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £2.50 per item.

Kids' Birthday Parties

This is a private party package for up to 8 drivers aged 8 years and older.

Kids' Birthday Parties Include:

  • 45 minutes of track time in 3 x 15 minute sessions. All guests taking part in 2 sessions each with the birthday person having a special treat and taking part in all 3 sessions.
  • Pizza Buffet with Crisps and squash in the private corporate room
  • Different Pizza Options to choose from
  • Orange/blackcurrant squash
  • Medal presentation plus a trophy for the birthday boy/girl

  • 2 Hour Session with Food

    15 Minutes Pre-Session Preparation

    45 Minutes Driving Time

    1 Hour Food & Medals

    £350up to 8 driversBook Now

11 driver, 16 driver, and 20 driver party packages also available.

1 Hour Practice / Family Session

Maximum of 6 x Juniors (8 - 11 yrs) or 10 x Adult (12yrs+). Age ranges can mix to make use of full 10 places.

Our 1 hour private hire session is perfect for parties and families looking for a great day or night out. This is a private party package for up to 10 drivers 8 years and older. Driving in our new Sodi Junior Racer and Adult SR4 200cc karts.

Includes printouts of lap times for all drivers. No food, trophies or medals are included but can they be purchased at extra cost.

Clock up those laps and see who can get the best lap time.

  • 1 Hour Private Hire

    25 Minute session

    10 Minute break to compare and discuss lap times, racing lines and that all important pit stop to the loo

    25 Minute Session

    £450up to 10 driversBook Now

  • 40 Minute Private Hire

    As above but a slightly shorter 15 Minute session followed by a short 10 Minute break to compare and discuss lap times, racing lines before heading back out for another 15 minutes of karting. Clock up those laps and see who can get the best lap time. 

    £350up to 10 driversBook Now

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

Address

  • 151 King Street
  • Stoke On Trent
  • Staffordshire
